node.title: 'It's now your turn to be uncomfortable': Australian beer's moment of reckoning
node.alt: Woman with blonder hair wearing purple cardigan stands in brewery with large steel containers behind
node.description: Amid reports of harassment and abuse in the Australian beer industry, a group of female leaders has banded together to force change.
node.content:
["Amid the hop fog of her inner-west Melbourne brewery, Jayne Lewis from Two Birds stands as one of the success stories of the local beer industry.\u00a0 \u00a0", "But when it comes to the horror stories of other women in the male-dominated scene, the co-founder of Australia's first female-owned brewery has heard just about everything.\u00a0", "", "
Jayne Lewis has banded together with a group of female beer industry leaders to create Beer Agents for Change.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "For years,\u00a0cultural issues have bubbled beneath the surface in Australian brewing.", "Ms Lewis and a group of female beer industry leaders are now confronting them head on.", "Calling themselves Beer Agents for Change, the group has undertaken a survey aimed at quantifying countless hushed conversations and privately shared anecdotes.", "The findings are sobering.\u00a0", "Of the 220 respondents who work in the industry, 38 per cent said they had been harassed or abused at work, while 20 per cent had experienced sexual abuse or harassment.\u00a0", "Of those who reported abuse or harassment, 90 per cent\u00a0were women.\u00a0", "", "
Tiffany Waldron is the president of the Pink Boots Society Australia.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "\"It's been really confronting to see the numbers in black and white, even for us,\" said Tiffany Waldron from Beer Agents for Change.\u00a0", "\"We knew that anecdotally there was an issue, but we probably needed to hold a mirror up to the industry and show everybody what it really looks like from the outside and from the inside.", "
US beer's #MeToo moment sparks change
", "", "
An Instagram post sparked a #MeToo movement for American beer.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "In May this year, US brewer Brienne Allan posted a one-line question on her Ratmagnet Instagram account \u2014 \"what sexist comments have you experienced?\"", "The flood of responses sparked a reckoning across American brewhouses, with the Boston Globe crediting Ms Allan with setting off a \"#MeToo movement in the beer industry.", "It immediately resonated with women in Australia.\u00a0", "\"I've heard it, I've seen it, I've experienced it,\" said beer educator, writer, and judge Kirrily Waldhorn.\u00a0", "\"Those stereotypes are really entrenched and really hard to break in the Australian beer industry, more so than any other beer industry around the world.", "\"I think because it's been promoted that way. Even when you work within it, that's the behaviour that was expected.\"", "", "
There are calls for change at a grass-roots level in the beer industry.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "Tiffany Waldron\u00a0wants to see leadership at a grass-roots level, from the bar stool to the brewery.\u00a0", "\"It's a million small things,\" she said.", "\"It's every time you applied for a job and they said you weren't skilled enough or didn't have enough experience. It's every time you worked behind a bar and had somebody harass you.", "\"It's all of the million little things that happen at every Beer Festival,\u00a0every bar, in every workplace that we've all worked in.", "\"All of those little things have really led us to go, 'This is a much bigger problem'.", "
Calls for craft scene culture shift
", "", "
Kirrily Waldhorn is a beer educator, writer and judge.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "Kirrily Waldhorn believes the conversation around cultural change is particularly relevant for Australia's multi-billion-dollar craft and independent beer sector.\u00a0", "\"A lot of these businesses are very small businesses\u00a0so they haven't got that corporate support and structure,\" she said.", "\"When people have tried to raise these issues within their businesses\u00a0they haven't been heard. They're being brushed under the table and not taken seriously.", "", "
Australia's craft beer scene employs tens of thousands of workers.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "It is something the Independent Brewers Association is rapidly trying to change.\u00a0", "The IBA recently released a mandatory code of conduct for its 531\u00a0brewery and associate members\u00a0which states they can now be removed if they do not uphold a central set of values and practices.\u00a0", "\"The code gives us a mechanism to be able to say, 'Your behaviour, or the way that your business is operating,\u00a0is not in line with our core values',\" Kylie Lethbridge, CEO of the IBA, said.", "The association will soon be rolling out a toolkit and set of support resources to help brewers and those in the beer industry respond when issues of harassment and inappropriate behaviour arise.", "", "
The survey found a high percentage of respondents had experienced abuse or harassment.(ABC News: Jeremy Story Carter)
", "For Two Birds founder and industry veteran Jayne Lewis, the moment of reckoning for the local beer scene has arrived.", "\"I think there is so much reluctance \u2014\u00a0I mean, you're having a beer, you don't necessarily want to be weighed down or be the downer \u2014 but I believe in this scenario\u00a0it's not on the women,\" she said."]
